name: JSP Runner
short_description: This is a stand-alone JSP converter/ Code Generator to Java source code, Compiles it & runs the class file. All in 1 command. JSP 0.9 for now. Small & Fast. to Run: type jspr c:foo.jsp, & it displays the contents in the console. Just what we need :)
